review: The amazon fire stick...I dont even know where to start. This thing is so awesome. As i dont own a regular fireTV i cannot say if this is faster or slower, but i can't imagine something that is faster than this! It get my movies from all my places and plays them with ease.I wish there was a casting function that worked super easily to play movies from my computer, but until then ill watch all my netflix and Prime movies.
author: IsaacFank

review: I love my Fire TV Stick! I did away with cable a while ago, and was looking for just a bit more options than over the air TV offered. I was tossing around the idea of Netflix, but decided to give Fire TV a try first seeing as how I already had a prime account, and could do Netflix with the Fire TV later if I felt I needed more options. I've had Fire TV for almost 2 wks now, and am very happy with it. Set up was simple and took less than 5 mins., the variety is plenty for me, and my daughter is loving having Dora back on TV again! I was also super excited to find soo much variety in the apps. There must be 2 dozen excersize options alone. I've even recommended the Fire TV Stick to friends!
